Translations.Text: namut minivalaval tula æti dæ pita karanu labana vaga ohu nodanne da
tavada hadavat tula æti dæ heli karanu labana vaga (ohu nodanne) da
niyata vasayenma edina ovunge paramadhipati ovun pilibanda va sarva gnaniya
kampanaya æti karana siduvimaki
kampanaya æti karana siduvima kumak da
kampanaya æti karana siduvima kumakdæ yi numbata dænum dunne kumakda
edina minisa visiri yana merun men vanu æta
tavada kandu piranu læbu lom men vanu æta
ebævin tama (yahakamhi) tulava barin vædi vu aya nam
ohu trptimat jivitayehi pasu veyi
tavada tama (yahakamhi) tulava barin sæhællu vi giya aya nam
ohuge vasasthanaya haviya ve
tavada eya (haviya) kumakdæ yi oba va dænuvat kale kumakda
(eya) dædi usnayen yut ginnaki
taranga vadimin (vastuva) adhika lesa ræs kirima (allah va sihipat kirimen) numbala va venatakata yomu kara æta
numbala minivalaval hamu vana turu
ese nova, numbala matu dæna gannehuya
yali ese nova, numbala matu dæna gannehuya
ese nova numbala sthavara dænumin dæna gannehu nam
numbala sæbævinma niraya dakinu æta
pasuva numbala eya tirasara lesa dakinu æta
tavada edina numbala (bhukti vinda vu) sæpa sampat pilibanda va vimasanu labanu æta
kalaya mata divuramin
sæbævinma minis vargaya alabhayehi pasu veti
namut (satyaya) visvasa kara, dæhæmi kriyavan itu kara, tavada satya pilibanda ekinekata upades di, tavada ivasima pilibandava da ekinekata upades dun aya hæra
dos nagamin ninda bas kiyana apahasa karamin kelam kiyana sæma kenekutama vinasaya at veva
ohu dhanaya ræs kota eya ganan karannekya
niyata vasayenma ohuge dhanaya ohu va sadakal jivat karanu ætæ yi ohu sitayi
ese nova sæbævinma ohu hutamave hi helanu labayi
hutama va yanu kumakdæ yi numbala dænuvat kale kumakda
eya avulanu læbu allahge ginnaya
eya sit mata ebikam karayi
sæbævinma eya ovun vata kara gannaki
us kulunu tula (hirakara)
numbage paramadhipati æt senava samanga katayutu kale kesedæ yi numba nudutuvehida
ovunge kumantranaya mula kirimehi pat nokaleda
tavada ohu ovun mata ramcu vasayen kurullan evveya
un ovun mata pulussana lada mæti valin vu gal heluveya
evita ovun va ka damana lada piduru men ohu pat kaleya
kureyisvarunhata hurupurudukam æti kirima venuven da
sita ha grisma rtuvan hi (vyapara katayutu sandaha) tavalamehi yæmata ovunhata hurupurudukam æti kirima venuven da
mema nivase paramadhipatita ovun næmadum karatva
kusaginnen (siti) ovunata ahara pirinama biyen (siti) ovunata araksava pirinæmuve ohuya
viniscaya dinaya boru karana aya numba dutuvehi da
enam ohu kavarekda yat anathaya va palava hariyi
tavada duppatage aharaya (laba dima) pilibanda va diri noganvayi
emenma salataya itu karannanhata vinasaya at veva
ovuhu kavarahu da yat ovuhu tamange salataya pilibanda va sælakillak dakvanno novuha
an ayata penva (purasaram doda)nnan vuha
novatina alpa vastun (piri næmima) pava valakvanno vuha
niyata vasayenma api numbata asimita sampat pirinæmuvemu
ebævin numba numbage paramadhipatita salataya itu kara numba (allah venuvenma) satekuge gela kapa harinu
niyata vasayenma numbata dos pavaranna vana ohumaya pelapata nomætta
(nabi muhammad) pavasanu aho deva pratiksepakayini
numbala namadina dæ mama nonamadimi
tavada numbala da ma namadina dæ namadinno novannehuya
tavada numbala næmadu dæ mama namadinnek novuyemi
ma namadina dæ numbala da namadinno novuha
numbalata numbalage dahamaya. mata mage dahamaya
allahge upakaraya ha (makka) jayagrahanaya pæmini vitada
tavada allahge dahamata janaya kandayam vasayen pivisenu numba dakina vita da
numba numbage paramadhipatige prasamsava tulin ohu va pivituru karanu. tavada ohugen samava ayæda sitinu. niyata vasayenma ohu atiksamasili viya
abu lahabge dæt vinasa veva! ohu da vinasa veva
ohuge dhanaya da ohu ipæyu dæ da ohuta phalak gena dunne næta
matuvata ohu agni jalaven yut nirayata pivisa dævenu æta
(ohu da) dara usulanniyak vu ohuge biriya da (agni jalaven yut nirayata pivisa dævenu æta)
æyage gelehi indi kendi valin yut kambayaki
(nabi muhammad) pavasanu. ohu enam allah ekiyaya
allah svadhinaya. (kisima avasyatavayak nomættaya)
ohu janita nokaleya. tavada janita karanu nolæbuveya
tavada ohuta samana kisiveku noviya
(nabi muhammad) numba pavasanu. arunodaye paramadhipati vetin mama araksava patami
ohu mævu dæhi haniyen da
tavada andura vihidunu vita ehi haniyen da
tavada gæta mata pimbinniyange haniyen da
irsya karanna irsya kala vita ehi haniyen da (araksava patami)
(nabi muhammad) numba pavasanu. minisunge paramadhipati vetin mama araksava patami
(ohu) minisunge raju (ve)
(ohu) minisunge deviya (da ve)
(napuru) kiliti kukus ætikarannage haniyen (ohugen araksava patami)
ohu minisunge sit tula kutuhalayan æti karayi
(mevannan) jinnun ha minisun atarada sititi
